price: 73.Tohih lakal ken sahitak Yallat agleh haak aqbaduk sugten Yallitte annih teetiiy keenik iyyan.
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
